content: पटीर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Beautiful, lovely. {@--2@} High, tall. --रः [पट्-ईरन्] {@--1@} A ball for playing with. {@--2@} Sandal-wood {@--3@} Cupid, the god of love. --रं {@--1@} Catechu. {@--2@} A sieve. {@--3@} The belly. {@--4@} A field. {@--5@} A cloud. {@--6@} Height. {@--7@} A radish. {@--8@} Rheumatism. {@--9@} Catarrh.
